description.narrative: Overall objective of the Public Administration Reform Monitoring (PARM) project is to capture the more immediate and concrete impact of the implementation of PAR as well as the progress in the implementation of the major objectives of the Government’s institutional and public administration reform agenda.

Transparency International i Bosnien och Hercegovina (TI BIH), tillsammans med Center for Investigative Journalism (CIN), ansökte 2013 till Sida om finansiering på 6 miljoner kronor för att genomföra projektet Public Administration Reform Monitoring (PARM) under en treårsperiod. Danmark som tillsammans (och via) Sverige medfinansierar en fond för public administration reform (PARCO-fund) visade intresse att stödja även denna insats. Det specifika målet med denna insats är att sätta större tryck på genomförandet av reformer inom den offentliga sektorn genom informations- och lobbyinginsatser från det civila samhället. Danmark har därför bidragit med ytterligare 1,5 miljoner danska kronor (cirka 1,75 mSEK) för projektgenomförandet vilket resulterade i projektperioden kan förlängas ytterligare ett år med en utökad budget. TI/CIN har därför justerat den ursprungliga arbetsplanen och budgeten med hänsyn till det nya totalbeloppet på 7,75 MSEK för fyra år. Projektet kommer att genomföras under perioden 2014-2018 .

Transparency International in Bosnia and Herzegovina (TI BIH ), together with the Center for Investigative Journalism (CIN) , applied in 2013 to Sida for funding of 6 million SEK to implement the project Public Administration Reform Monitoring (PARM) over a three year period. Denmark, which together (and through) Sweden is co-financing a fund for the public administration reform (PARCO fund), showed interest to support even this effort. The specific objective of this contribution is to put more pressure on the implementation of reforms in the public sector through information and lobbying efforts by civil society. Denmark decided to contribute an additional 1.5 million Danish kroner ( approximately 1.75 mSEK ) for project implementation which resulted in the project period to be extended for an additional year with an additional budget . TI/CIN has therefore adjusted the original work plan and budget to match the new total of 7.75 million for four years. The project will be implemented over the period 2014-2018 .

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: PARM has achieved its objectives and planned results. PARM has monitored progress in the implementation of the major objectives of the government’s institutional and public administration agenda, as well as the concrete impact of PAR implementation. An improved framework for PAR implementation through the monitoring has been noted, and there are indications of change in institutions as a result of the monitoring activities. Moreover, in context of larger framework of EU Integration, PARM project has been relevant to BiH’s EU integration processes, addressing the most important areas for improvement in the public sector reform process in Bosnia and Herzegovina. Furthermore, based on findings and observations made by external auditor PARM project “is achieving its objectives and planned results, and in terms of efficiency, PARM demonstrates a number of areas where efficiency of approach has contributed to programme outcomes. There are a number of areas in which the work and outcomes of the PARM project appear to be contributing to sustainable impact in PAR processes in BiH.”
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
